biotools.summary: PDB_Hydro provides tools for mutating and solvating structures of biological macromolecules like proteins or DNA. It identifies strongly and poorly solvated exposed surfaces of structures in an effort to help identify potential interaction zones.

bioschemas.name: PDB_Hydro
bioschemas.summary: PDB_Hydro provides tools for mutating and solvating structures of biological macromolecules like proteins or DNA. It identifies strongly and poorly solvated exposed surfaces of structures in an effort to help identify potential interaction zones.
